entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 11 inland.
